General.Name: Camellia Metal Co Ltd
General.Description: Camellia Metal Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of steel bars and wires in Taiwan. It offers low-carbon, middle-carbon, high-carbon, free cutting, alloy, and stainless steel bars and wires, as well as spring steel bars. The company's products are used in motor, mechanical, and office machine shafts, and other materials; high precision materials, including electronics, telecommunications, information, and home appliances; screwdrivers, hexagonal wrenches, sleeves, special screws, and other materials; materials for automobiles, bridges, steel structures, construction screws, etc.; automotive coil springs, torsion bars, and balance bars materials; and materials for medical, aerospace technology, household appliances, etc. Camellia Metal Co., Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Lukang, Taiwan.
General.Address: Chang Bin Industrial Park, Lukang, Taiwan, 50544
